item.title: 苹果发布新款AirTag，具备更远探测距离和更响亮扬声器
item.description: 苹果公司发布了升级版AirTag配件，这款售价29美元的物品追踪器现具备更远的探测距离、更响亮的扬声器及其他改进功能。【原文：Apple Inc. unveiled an upgraded AirTag accessory, with the $29 item finder now offering longer range, a louder speaker and other improvements.】

item.title: 美股上涨，交易员将目光投向华盛顿新风险之外
item.description: 周一早盘，美国股市高开，交易员们权衡了新的贸易和政策风险，以及强劲的第四季度财报开局。【原文：US stocks opened higher Monday morning as traders weighed a combination of fresh trade and policy risks against a strong start to fourth-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 两名非洲债务国退出困境国家俱乐部，仅剩塞内加尔
item.description: 在莫桑比克和加蓬的债务收益率相对美国国债收窄后，塞内加尔成为非洲唯一主权风险溢价仍处于困境区域的国家。【原文：Senegal has been left as the only African nation with a sovereign risk premium in distressed territory after yields on the debt of Mozambique and Gabon narrowed relative to US Treasuries.】

item.title: 塞内加尔与摩洛哥签署协议以加强两国关系，此前两国因足球事件产生分歧
item.description: 塞内加尔正努力加强与主要贸易伙伴摩洛哥的关系，此前非洲顶级足球赛事中一场争议性比赛给两国历来密切的双边关系蒙上阴影。【原文：Senegal is striving to bolster ties with key trading partner Morocco, after a contentious match at Africa’s top football event cast a shadow over their historically close relationship.】

item.title: WhatsApp“频道”受欧盟内容法规约束，该法规遭特朗普痛恨
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.旗下WhatsApp消息平台的信息推送功能，已成为最新一项受欧盟内容审核规则约束的科技巨头服务。该规则被特朗普政府比作审查制度。【原文：Information feeds on Meta Platforms Inc.’s WhatsApp messaging platform have become the latest Big Tech service to fall under European Union content-moderation rules likened to censorship by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔债务重组后首次重返债务市场
item.description: 厄瓜多尔将于周一重返全球债务市场，这是该国自2020年完成债务重组以来的首次债券发行。【原文：Ecuador is looking to return to global debt markets on Monday with its first issuance since completing a restructuring in 2020.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利、美银看好2009年以来最强套利行情
item.description: 投资者抛售美元买入新兴市场货币的策略在2026年开局便获利丰厚，各大银行策略师预计此类策略将延续去年18%的涨幅。【原文：Investors selling the dollar to buy emerging-market currencies are off to a lucrative start to 2026, with strategists at top banks expecting such strategies to build further on last year’s 18% rally.】

item.title: 詹妮弗·加纳旗下Once Upon a Farm公司计划在美国IPO募资2.09亿美元
item.description: 由女演员詹妮弗·加纳联合创立的有机儿童零食制造商Once Upon a Farm PBC及其部分投资者，正计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达2.09亿美元资金。【原文：Once Upon a Farm PBC, the organic kids snacks maker co-founded by actress Jennifer Garner, and some of its investors are seeking to raise as much as $209 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 英伟达推出人工智能技术助力天气预报
item.description: 英伟达公司推出了一系列新的开源软件和模型，旨在帮助政府和企业更轻松地运用人工智能和复杂数据来构建自己的气象预报系统。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is offering new open-source software and models designed to help governments and businesses more easily use artificial intelligence and complex data to build their own weather forecasting systems.】

item.title: 黑石、洋马据称考虑竞购大众旗下Everllence公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团与日本工业设备制造商洋马控股公司已浮出水面，成为竞购大众汽车集团旗下重型柴油发动机业务部门Everllence SE多数股权的潜在竞标者。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Japanese industrial equipment maker Yanmar Holdings Co. have emerged as potential bidders for a majority stake in Volkswagen AG’s heavy diesel engine unit Everllence SE, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 鲍勃折扣家具公司拟通过首次公开募股筹集3.7亿美元
item.description: 博比折扣家具公司是一家由贝恩资本支持的家居用品零售商，正计划通过在美国首次公开募股筹集高达3.7亿美元的资金。【原文：Bob’s Discount Furniture Inc., a home furnishings retailer backed by Bain Capital, is seeking to raise as much as $370 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国耐用品订单增幅创六个月新高
item.description: 美国11月耐用品订单增幅创六个月新高，主要得益于商用飞机及其他资本设备订单的增长。【原文：US orders for durable goods increased in November by the most in six months, boosted by bookings for commercial aircraft and other capital equipment.】

item.title: 数百家供应商加入平台对接国防企业
item.description: 据行业协会称，约500家企业已加入德国政府资助的平台，该平台旨在促进企业与国防工业的对接。其中多达90%的企业此前从未涉足军工产品领域。【原文：About 500 companies have joined a German government-sponsored platform to connect businesses with the defense industry, and as many as 90% have no previous experience with military products, according to industry associations.】

item.title: 高盛创纪录交易后重返美元债券市场
item.description: 高盛集团在完成160亿美元债券发售仅一周后，便重返美元债券市场——这是华尔街银行有史以来规模最大的债券发行。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is making a return to the US dollar bond market just over a week since its $16 billion bond sale — the biggest on record for a Wall Street bank.】

item.title: 肯尼亚将茶叶生产转向更高价值的正统品种
item.description: 肯尼亚作为全球最大的红茶出口国，正大力提升传统工艺红茶的产量。这类红茶价格更高且需求持续增长。【原文：Kenya, the world’s largest exporter of black tea, is ramping up production of orthodox teas, which fetch higher prices and are seeing rising demand.】

item.title: 分析师青睐的益博睿因"人工智能输家"担忧延续跌势
item.description: 益博睿（Experian Plc）股价跌至两年低点，投资者押注这家备受分析师青睐的富时100指数成分股公司将因人工智能自动化信用评分而遭受冲击。【原文：Experian Plc shares have fallen to a two-year low as investors bet that one of analysts’ favorite FTSE 100 stocks will suffer as artificial intelligence automates credit scoring.】

item.title: 高盛顶级贵金属交易员比内-莱斯内离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团贵金属交易主管本杰明·比内-莱斯内即将离职。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s head of precious metals trading Benjamin Binet-Laisne is leaving the bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 威兹航空放弃中东计划后寻求美国飞行许可
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司旗下英国子公司已申请开通飞往美国的航线，此前数月该廉价航空公司进军中东市场的计划宣告失败。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc’s UK subsidiary applied for permission to fly to the US, months after the budget carrier’s plans to expand in the Middle East fell through.】

item.title: 英伟达再向CoreWeave注资20亿美元，推出新型芯片
item.description: 英伟达公司——这家人工智能芯片领域的龙头企业——向CoreWeave公司追加投资20亿美元，旨在加速推进其目标：到2030年新增超过5吉瓦的人工智能计算能力。【原文：Nvidia Corp., the dominant maker of artificial intelligence chips, invested an additional $2 billion in CoreWeave Inc. to help speed up an effort to add more than 5 gigawatts of AI computing capacity by 2030.】

item.title: 油轮运费因地缘政治风险飙升
item.description: 从委内瑞拉到伊朗，动荡加剧的世界正推高原油运输成本。【原文：From Venezuela to Iran, an increasingly turbulent world is pushing up the costs of hauling crude.】

item.title: 瑞穗银行在招聘浪潮中吸纳汇丰银行的康纳和摩根大通的德玛利亚
item.description: 知情人士透露，瑞穗金融集团已聘请乔恩·康纳和蒂博·德·玛利亚加入其高级投资银行家团队，此次招聘尚未公开，故要求匿名。【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. has brought in Jon Connor and Thibaud de Maria as part of a hiring wave of senior investment bankers, said people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified because it wasn’t public yet.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁消退后欧洲垃圾债销售激增
item.description: 欧洲垃圾债券和贷款销售激增，因企业趁着美国总统特朗普放弃对格陵兰岛相关关税威胁后地缘政治紧张局势缓解之机。【原文：Europe’s junk-debt sales for bonds and loans surged as firms took advantage of easing geopolitical tensions after US President Donald Trump abandoned his Greenland-linked tariff threats.】

item.title: 裕信银行计划开展与50亿欧元贷款挂钩的证券化交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，裕信银行计划就约50亿欧元（60亿美元）贷款发行两笔重大风险转移。【原文：UniCredit SpA is planning to issue two significant risk transfers tied to around €5 billion ($6 billion) of loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦巨型腾吉兹油田准备恢复产量
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦最大的石油生产商正准备重启巨型腾吉兹油田的产量，这是该国在经历近月来一系列供应中断后，进一步恢复向全球市场正常供油的举措。【原文：Kazakhstan’s largest oil producer is preparing to resume output at the giant Tengiz field, a further step to normalize the nation’s supply to global markets after a series of disruptions in recent months.】

item.title: 贝莱德称欧洲股市资金流动呈现"十年浓缩于一年"态势
item.description: 据贝莱德公司乌苏拉·马尔基奥尼称，2025年欧洲股票类交易所交易产品需求异常旺盛，其资金流入量堪称"十年之功仅用一年便达成"。【原文：Demand for exchange-traded products focused on European equities was so strong in 2025 that they attracted a “decade in a year” of inflows, according to BlackRock Inc.’s Ursula Marchioni.】

item.title: 美国稀土公司获得16亿美元美国政府资金支持
item.description: 美国稀土公司与商务部签署了一份非约束性协议，将获得16亿美元资金以加速美国关键稀土元素的生产。【原文：USA Rare Earth Inc. signed a non-binding agreement with the Commerce Department to receive $1.6 billion in funding to accelerate US production of key rare-earth elements.】

item.title: 电气设备制造商Forgent寻求在美国IPO募资16.2亿美元
item.description: 数据中心电力设备设计制造商Forgent Power Solutions公司计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达16.2亿美元资金。【原文：Forgent Power Solutions Inc., a designer and manufacturer of electrical equipment used in data centers, is seeking to raise as much as $1.62 billion in its initial public offering.】

item.title: 石油市场观察人士对2026年前景意见相左
item.description: 试图预测今年油价走势的石油交易商们，正面临着对供需前景截然不同的评估——从巨大过剩到基本平衡的市场。【原文：Oil traders seeking to plot the path for prices this year are juggling sharply different assessments of the supply-demand outlook, from a huge surplus to a broadly balanced market.】

item.title: 种子轮融资已成过去，初创企业正开启椰子轮融资
item.description: 初创企业的首轮融资规模激增，催生了对新标签的需求。【原文：Debut funding for startups has exploded, spurring the need for a new label.】

item.title: 人工智能处方初创公司Tandem估值达10亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，致力于运用人工智能简化医疗处方开具与接收流程的医疗科技初创企业Tandem Technology Inc.，公司估值已达10亿美元。【原文：Health care technology startup Tandem Technology Inc., which aims to smooth the process of writing and receiving medical prescriptions using artificial intelligence, has reached a valuation of $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】
